nodes.text: The Coruscant Benevolent Society was an organization which operated on the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Republic. The society gave out an award titled the Good Neighbor of the Year award, which they bestowed upon the Kedorzhan Senator Dewell Bronk three times while he lived on Coruscant, due to his helpful nature.

The society was first mentioned in the short story "Incognito", which was published in Star Wars Insider 143 in 2013. The story was written by John Jackson Miller as a tie in to his upcoming novel, Kenobi.
